withSearch.title: Searchable Multi-Select
withSearch.code:
<script setup>
import { ref, computed } from 'vue';

const allOptions = ref(/* 100+ options */);
const searchQuery = ref('');
const selected = ref([]);

const filteredOptions = computed(() => {
  if (!searchQuery.value) return allOptions.value;
  return allOptions.value.filter(opt => 
    opt.text.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.value.toLowerCase())
  );
});
</script>

<template>
  <InMultiSelect
    label-text="Search and Select"
    search-status
    :options="filteredOptions"
    :value="selected"
    @search="searchQuery = $event"
    @change="selected = $event"
  />
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, computed } from 'vue';

const state = computed(() => 
  selected.value.length >= maxItems ? 'warning' : 'default'
);

const stateMessage = computed(() => 
  selected.value.length >= maxItems

    : ''
);

    :value="selected"
    :max-selectable-item="maxItems"
    :state="state"

implementationPatterns.name: Form Multi-Select with Validation
implementationPatterns.code:
<script setup>
import { ref, computed } from 'vue';
import { InMultiSelect } from '@useinsider/design-system-vue';

const selectedCategories = ref([]);
const minRequired = 2;

const state = computed(() => {
  if (selectedCategories.value.length === 0) return 'default';
  if (selectedCategories.value.length < minRequired) return 'error';
  return 'success';
});

const stateMessage = computed(() => {
  if (selectedCategories.value.length < minRequired) {
    return `Please select at least ${minRequired} categories`;
  }
  return '';
});

const categories = [
  { text: 'Technology', value: 'tech' },
  { text: 'Business', value: 'business' },
  { text: 'Science', value: 'science' },
  { text: 'Arts', value: 'arts' }
];
</script>

<template>
  <form>
    <InMultiSelect
      id="categories"
      label-text="Select Categories"
      :options="categories"
      :value="selectedCategories"
      :state="state"
      :state-message="stateMessage"
      @change="selectedCategories = $event"
    />
  </form>
</template>

implementationPatterns.name: Tag Management
implementationPatterns.description: Create and manage tags with multi-select
implementationPatterns.code:
<script setup>
import { ref } from 'vue';
import { InMultiSelect } from '@useinsider/design-system-vue';

const allTags = ref([
  { text: 'Important', value: 'important' },
  { text: 'Urgent', value: 'urgent' },
  { text: 'Review', value: 'review' }
]);

const itemTags = ref([]);

const createTag = (tagName: string) => {
  const newTag = {
    text: tagName,
    value: tagName.toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g, '-')
  };
  
  // Add to available tags
  allTags.value.push(newTag);
  
  // Auto-select the new tag
  itemTags.value.push(newTag);
};
</script>

<template>
  <InMultiSelect
    id="tag-manager"
    label-text="Tags"
    :options="allTags"
    :value="itemTags"
    create-option-status
    option-validation-type="text"
    create-button-label="Create Tag"
    search-status
    @change="itemTags = $event"
    @addOption="createTag"
  />
</template>
